data.title: gategourmet
data.meta_description: Gate Gourmet was founded in Switzerland in 1992 to cater Swissair. Today we’re a global company with the most comprehensive catering network in the aviation industry.
data.text:
Every gategourmet unit has a standardized culinary operating model in place, to best focus on the customer needs and to turn quality raw materials into delicious meals that will be served on board. gategourmet delivers thousands of meals every day all over the world.

gategourmet is proud to have one of the most experienced and innovative teams of menu designers and operational chefs in the industry. Our executive chefs have worked at some of the world’s finest restaurants and have a flair for true hospitality. They stay abreast of the latest developments in the culinary world and scout for the latest food trends to design contemporary menus that can be replicated in large quantities. Our chefs’ expertise spans all kind of international cuisines.

gategourmet is present in 33 countries with over 135 units. We have fully equipped kitchens as well as logistic centers across the globe to provide holistic catering service operations. We can offer remote catering solutions in some countries through our extensive network and in certain locations we have local partnerships to provide the service. Find out where we are present and contact us with any inquiries.
